jobs.description: Develop and optimize website/web app interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks (React, Angular, Vue, etc.). Collaborate with UI/UX designers and backend developers to deliver smooth and user-friendly experiences. Test, debug, and ensure performance, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility.
jobs.requirement: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+). Familiar with ReactJS and RESTful APIs. Basic knowledge of Git and responsive design principles.
jobs.benefit: 13th month salary and annual bonuses, health insurance, wellness programs, opportunities for professional growth.

jobs.description: Design and implement server-side logic using NodeJS and Express framework. Manage databases and ensure data integrity across distributed systems.
jobs.requirement: Experience in NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB. Knowledge of RESTful API design and JWT authentication. Familiar with deployment tools like Docker or PM2.
jobs.benefit: Hybrid working mode, performance bonuses, yearly company trip.

jobs.description: Build modern and scalable web applications using Angular framework. Work closely with backend teams to integrate APIs and ensure smooth data flow.
jobs.requirement: Strong understanding of TypeScript, Angular components, and RxJS. Knowledge of SCSS and cross-browser compatibility issues.
jobs.benefit: Annual health check, paid leave, on-site parking, team-building events.

jobs.description: Design and develop full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and NodeJS. Responsible for both frontend and backend development tasks.
jobs.requirement: Proficient in MERN stack development. Strong understanding of API design, JWT authentication, and frontend optimization.
jobs.benefit: Flexible schedule, 100% remote option, 13th month salary.

jobs.description: Develop efficient backend systems and microservices using GoLang. Work on scalable architectures handling high traffic web applications.
jobs.requirement: Strong experience in Go, REST APIs, and cloud deployment. Familiar with Kubernetes and CI/CD workflows.
jobs.benefit: Stock options, yearly bonus, premium health insurance.
